title: Jonas Vingegaard Stomps Rivals to Top Tirreno-Adriatico: ‘The Plan Worked Perfectly’
content:
Two-time Tour de France champion sends signal to challengers near and afar with long-distance solo attack to win stage and snag leader's jersey.

Read the full article at Jonas Vingegaard Stomps Rivals to Top Tirreno-Adriatico: ‘The Plan Worked Perfectly’ on Velo.
author: ahood
